content.raw: You are right, I missed a commit. Both the EO automatic generation commit and the corresponding test case for the PylonCamera are now in the PRs. I also found an issue with using the mock camera from the PylonCamera wrapper that I’ve fixed as well, so everything but the actual device programming can be tested by whomever. Thanks again @{557058:cbf1bc43-1dc2-477b-9e25-1a8f40fd7ee3} for a nice, robust mock testing camera class.
content.html: You are right, I missed a commit. Both the EO automatic generation commit and the corresponding test case for the PylonCamera are now in the PRs. I also found an issue with using the mock camera from the PylonCamera wrapper that I’ve fixed as well, so everything but the actual device programming can be tested by whomever. Thanks again @Chris Billington for a nice, robust mock testing camera class.
